official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to purchase certain land for addition to the Saint Croix National Scenic Riverway in the State of Wisconsin.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to acquire by purchase specified lands adjacent to the boundary of the Saint Croix National Scenic Riverway in Douglas County, Wisconsin, to be administered as part of the Riverway. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to purchase certain land for addition to the Saint Croix National Scenic Riverway in the State of Wisconsin.
